availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: N. H. Marks (Nelson County, Kentucky, gunsmith & JP)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, gunsmith. Kentucky native. Gunsmith in Nelson County in 1863. Wrote and signed petition on behalf of John C. Scifres in Nelson County in 1861. Served as a justice of the peace in Nelson County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 5th Congressional District, Vol. 3, July 1863, p. 457, (Accessed via ancestry.com on January 28, 2020).
KYR-0001-017-0080.
